meanings.definition: (ポルトガル語)経験不足の、未熟な

inflection.notes: This is an adjective, so it changes based on gender and number. Masculine singular: inexperiente; Feminine singular: inexperiente; Masculine plural: inexperientes; Feminine plural: inexperientes.

usage_notes.explanation: This word is used to describe someone who lacks experience in a particular area or generally.
